text: Andrey Kondryshev (born 24 August 1983) is a Kazakhstani cross-country skier. He competed in the men's 50 kilometre freestyle event at the 2006 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:Kazakhstani male cross-country skiers Category:Olympic cross-country skiers of Kazakhstan Category:Cross-country skiers at the 2006 Winter Olympics Category:People from Kostanay Category:Asian Games medalists in cross-country skiing Category:Cross-country skiers at the 2007 Asian Winter Games Category:Medalists at the 2007 Asian Winter Games Category:Asian Games gold medalists for Kazakhstan Category:Asian Games silver medalists for Kazakhstan
title: Andrey Kondryshev
